testcase.name: Successful Booking Confirmation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on hotel booking page with "seleniumtesting" and "password1"..passed Then Selects the hotel location.............................................passed And Selects Hotel...........................................................passed And Selects the type of room................................................passed And Chooses number of rooms.................................................passed And enters "04/04/2019" and "05/05/2019" dates..............................passed And Selects number of Audlts in a room......................................passed And also mentions the number of children in a room..........................passed Then clicks on search button................................................passed And Selects the available room..............................................passed Then User clicks on continue button.........................................passed Then Enter billing details and click on book now............................passed

testcase.name: Successful Booking Confirmation 2
